name: Neverwinter Nights: Hordes of the Underdark
name_original: Neverwinter Nights: Hordes of the Underdark
description:
Neverwinter Nights: Hordes of the Underdark is a RPG game developed by BioWare. It came out on 03-12-2003. It was published by Atari. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Neverwinter Nights: Hordes of the Underdark is available on PC.
